p: Hemocytes are cells that circulate within hemolymph, and are permissive to viral infection including DENV [ 15], SINV [ 80] and WNV [ 81]. The hemocyte-mediated immune response is immediate and includes pattern recognition, phagocytosis, nodulation, melanization, production of antimicrobial peptides and initiation of signaling cascades for cytotoxic effectors to clear infection [ 20, 80, 82].
